parameters.name: Jog
parameters.description: True if jog points are on, false if not

parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index, 0 or 1, of linear dimension extension line; ignored if an ordinate dimension

title: IModelDocExtension.JogDimension
description: Gets or sets whether jog points are on or off on an interactively selected linear or ordinate dimension.
signature:
System.Boolean JogDimension( 
   System.Boolean
Jog
,
   System.Int16
WitnessIndex
)

parameters.name: Jog
parameters.description: True if jog points are on, false if not

parameters.name: WitnessIndex
parameters.description: Index, 0 or 1, of linear dimension extension line; ignored if an ordinate dimension

returns: True if operation succeeds, false if it fails
remarks:
This method is equivalent to clicking the right-mouse button on a linear or ordinate dimension in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface, selecting
Display
Options
on the shortcut menu, and selecting
Jog
.
Call
IModelView::GraphicsRedraw
after setting jog points to redraw the graphics area.

examples.title: Add and Offset Dimension Extension Lines Jogs (VBA)
